title: Demons

properties.name: description
properties.value: Demons are a category of creature characterized by a beastly appearance, and often a red or black colouration. Most demons are followers of Zamorak, the god of chaos, and as such, are often considered to be evil. Demons prefer attacking with melee, although a few are also known to use ranged and magical attacks. When a demon dies, they typically leave behind demonic ashes instead of bones.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:DemonsThe RuneScape Classic Wiki also has an article on: classicrsw:Demons
This article is about the race. For the monster attribute, see Demon (attribute).

Demons are a category of creature characterized by a beastly appearance, and often a red or black colouration. Most demons are followers of Zamorak, the god of chaos, and as such, are often considered to be evil. Demons prefer attacking with melee, although a few are also known to use ranged and magical attacks. When a demon dies, they typically leave behind demonic ashes instead of bones.

A wide variety of creatures are encompassed in this category, including many which are not explicitly referred to as demons in-game. Some demons are considered sub-classes of other varieties, and thus will count towards a Slayer task for the primary class. These cases are labelled in parenthesis.

Standard demons have the demon attribute, which means that they are vulnerable to the effects of demonbane weapons.

Contents

  • 1 Standard
  • 2 Other Demons
  • 3 Fiend
  • 4 Revenant
  • 5 Boss
  • 6 Quest and Miniquest
  • 7 NPCs
  • 8 Pets

Standard[edit | edit source]

  • Imp
    • Imp Champion
  • Lesser demon
    • Lesser Demon Champion
  • Greater demon
  • Black demon
  • Abyssal demon
    • Greater abyssal demon
  • Ice demon

Other Demons[edit | edit source]

"Other demons" are non-typical depictions of demons. As of the Shooting Stars patch, demonbane weapons WILL work against them unless otherwise noted.
  • Bloodveld
    • Insatiable Bloodveld
    • Mutated Bloodveld
      • Insatiable Mutated Bloodveld
  • Blood Reaver
  • Demonic gorilla (Black demon)
  • Hellhound
    • Skeleton Hellhound (as an undead, they are not vulnerable to demonbane)
    • Greater Skeleton Hellhound (as an undead, they are not vulnerable to demonbane)
  • Nechryael
    • Death spawn
    • Greater Nechryael
    • Nechryarch
      • Chaotic death spawn

Fiend[edit | edit source]

"Fiend" type monsters are considered a subclass of demons. As of the Shooting Stars patch, demonbane weapons WILL work against them.
  • Icefiend
  • Pyrefiend and Flaming pyrelord
  • Waterfiend
  • Pyrelord and Infernal pyrelord

Revenant[edit | edit source]

As with all revenants, Salve amulet and its variants work against them. Demonbane weapons do NOT work against these undead variants.
  • Revenant imp
  • Revenant hellhound
  • Revenant pyrefiend
  • Revenant demon

Boss[edit | edit source]

  • Abyssal Sire (Abyssal demon)
  • Cerberus (Hellhound)
  • K'ril Tsutsaroth (Greater demon, holy water does not work)
    • Balfrug Kreeyath (Black demon)
    • Tstanon Karlak (Greater demon)
    • Zakl'n Gritch (Lesser demon)
  • Porazdir (Black demon, but only harmed by Flames of Zamorak or demonbane weapons)
  • Skotizo (Black demon, Greater demon)
  • Zalcano (skilling boss)

Quest and Miniquest[edit | edit source]

  • Delrith
  • Nezikchened
  • Jungle Demon
  • Chronozon
  • Agrith-Naar
  • Othainian
  • Holthion
  • Doomion
  • Porazdir
  • Kolodion (Black demon, final form only)

NPCs[edit | edit source]

  • Alathazdrar (Demon butler)
  • Lithil
  • Mazchna
  • Sergeant Damien
  • Thammaron
  • Yama
  • Hell-Rat and Hell-Rat Behemoths
  • Imp defender

Pets[edit | edit source]

  • Abyssal orphan
  • Hellcat
  • Hellpuppy
  • K'ril Tsutsaroth Jr.
  • Skotos
  • Smolcano

{{external|rs|rsc}}{{otheruses|the race|the monster attribute|Demon (attribute)}}
'''Demons''' are a category of creature characterized by a beastly appearance, and often a red or black colouration. Most demons are followers of [[Zamorak]], the god of chaos, and as such, are often considered to be evil. Demons prefer attacking with melee, although a few are also known to use ranged and magical attacks. When a demon dies, they typically leave behind [[demonic ashes]] instead of bones.

A wide variety of creatures are encompassed in this category, including many which are not explicitly referred to as demons in-game. Some demons are considered sub-classes of other varieties, and thus will count towards a [[Slayer task]] for the primary class. These cases are labelled in parenthesis.

Standard demons have the [[demon (monster type)|demon attribute]], which means that they are vulnerable to the effects of [[demonbane weapons]].

==Standard==
*[[Imp]]
**[[Imp Champion]]
*[[Lesser demon]]
**[[Lesser Demon Champion]]
*[[Greater demon]]
*[[Black demon]]
*[[Abyssal demon]]
**[[Greater abyssal demon]]
*[[Ice demon]]

==Other Demons==
:''"Other demons" are non-typical depictions of demons. As of the [[Shooting Stars]] patch, [[demonbane weapons]] WILL work against them unless otherwise noted.''
*[[Bloodveld]]
**[[Insatiable Bloodveld]]
**[[Mutated Bloodveld]]
***[[Insatiable Mutated Bloodveld]]
*[[Blood Reaver]]
*[[Demonic gorilla]] (Black demon)
*[[Hellhound]]
**[[Skeleton Hellhound]] (as an undead, they are not vulnerable to demonbane)
**[[Greater Skeleton Hellhound]] (as an undead, they are not vulnerable to demonbane)
*[[Nechryael]]
**[[Death spawn]]
**[[Greater Nechryael]]
**[[Nechryarch]]
***[[Chaotic death spawn]]

==Fiend==
:''"Fiend" type monsters are considered a subclass of demons. As of the [[Shooting Stars]] patch, [[demonbane weapons]] WILL work against them.''
*[[Icefiend]]
*[[Pyrefiend]] and [[Flaming pyrelord]]
*[[Waterfiend]]
*[[Pyrelord]] and [[Infernal pyrelord]]

==Revenant==
:''As with all revenants, [[Salve amulet]] and its variants work against them. [[Demonbane weapons]] do NOT work against these undead variants.''
*[[Revenant imp]]
*[[Revenant hellhound]]
*[[Revenant pyrefiend]]
*[[Revenant demon]]

==Boss==
*[[Abyssal Sire]] (Abyssal demon)
*[[Cerberus]]  (Hellhound)
*[[K'ril Tsutsaroth]] (Greater demon, holy water does not work)
**[[Balfrug Kreeyath]] (Black demon)
**[[Tstanon Karlak]] (Greater demon)
**[[Zakl'n Gritch]] (Lesser demon)
*[[Porazdir]] (Black demon, but only harmed by [[Flames of Zamorak]] or [[demonbane weapons]])
*[[Skotizo]] (Black demon, Greater demon)
*[[Zalcano]] (skilling boss)

==Quest and Miniquest==

*[[Nezikchened]]
